features: Enjoy Shaving Again - Our men's grooming products are crafted with safe, natural, plant-derived ingredients to give you the smoothest shave possible without risking razor burn. Use this shaving cream anywhere you shave and pair with your skin care for men regimen.

TSA Friendly - All our products are available in small but mighty 3.4 ounce sizes which are carry-on compliant and good for up to 100 shaves. While this is mostly a shaving cream for men, it's also a shaving cream women can easily pack for last minute trips. No more having to search for a sensitive skin shaving cream when traveling, we got you covered.
Smoother Shave - Save your skin from redness, irritation, and bumps with a paraben-free natural shaving cream for men with no synthetic fragrances. This is a shaving cream sensitive skin will love.
Natural Ingredients - Our clean formula includes certified organic ingredients to keep even the most sensitive skin healthy, soothed, and hydrated.
Cruelty-Free - Unlike so many men's shaving cream products and even shaving cream for women, Pacific Shaving Company’s products are never ever tested on animals.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Bamboo Pre-Shave Scrub Natural Shave Cream Everyday Moisturizer Caffeinated Shave Cream Caffeinated After Shave Nick Stick Step in Routine Pre Shave Shave Cream Post Shave Shave Cream Post Shave Post Shave Description Remove dead skin cells, clean, and moisturize in one simple step. With safe, natural, and plant-derived ingredients, our unique formula is about to become your skin's best friend. This unique blend of natural and potent moisturizers and antioxidants lets you skip the stinky stuff, and keeps your skin hydrated and healthy all day. This outstanding shaving cream utilizes the many benefits of naturally-derived caffeine to help liven up your morning shave routine. This outstanding aftershave moisturizer utilizes the many benefits of naturally-derived caffeine to help liven up your morning shave routine Nicks happen. Now you can do something about it - without the tissue paper. Made with Safe, Natural Ingredients ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Good for All Skin Types ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The reason for why I like this product versus the more trendier Kind is because it has less chemicals Um I use this first time and Love the results really smooth With shaving Didn't leave me irritated no bumps Definitely recommend this It doesn't have a smell but that's you know All right Especially if you have sensitive skin definitely don't want to irritate it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Truly love how slick the feel of this shaving cream is. It covers lightly, you don't need a lot, and it prevents razor burn and many nicks too, I think. The scent is subtle; and it's refreshing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars very good shaving cream !
reviews.reviewText: the best shaving cream i ever used and made my skin feel smooth with no razor burn and the scent smells very good on my skin this natural shaving cream is no doubt the best for my skin it's true a little goes a long way.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Terrific Shave Cream!
reviews.reviewText: This is a soothing and moisturizing shave cream that works the best with a brush. I like it more than pricey creams that cost 2-3 times as much. It builds a lather quickly, and is especially good for face and palm latherers like me. Its cooling ingredients treat my aged and easily irritated skin kindly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well -- if you use it right
reviews.reviewText: I can't give this five stars ... yet, but I'm pretty sure that after a few more shaves, I probably will.This shave cream prepared my face and neck for a smooth, comforable shave, even though I was using a blade that had already been used a few times, and I was shaving a two day growth of beard.I only used a pea sized (or smaller) bit of the shave cream.After reading all the reviews, it seems obvious that most of the negative reviews came from users who didn't understand te product and expected a full, billowy lather like you get out of an aerosol can. They probably used way more than they needed in order to get this lather. This large amount may have clogged their blades, was difficult to rinse out of the blades, and produced a very strong scent. I can see how, operating on the assumption that it took a LOT of product to create a LOT of foam, the negative feedback was appropriate -- although the product was used incorrectlyThe goal of his cream, as I understand it, is to ceate the conditions necessary for a smooth, comforable shave. The goal wasn't to compete with Edge, Barbasol, Colgate or other aerosols that produce a lot of thick foam.I slapped warm water on my face to warm the skin and hair I put a small amount of shave cream in the palm of one hand, and spread it onto my face with the other hand. I put a litle water on my fingers and rubbed it in, producing a thin 'foamy' film. (Although I have a shaving brush, this didn't prodce a lot of laher for me). Once the cream was worked in, I shaved. The shave was smooth - possibly smooher than I got from other products. After shaving, the remaining product washed off, leaving no residual fragrance. THIS, I BELIEVE, was probably the right way to use this shave cream.So- after two shaves - I LIKE it. I may add more to this review after a few more shaves.---I've had this for a few months.I really like it.I started using more than a 'pea' sized bit of this shaving cream, and am able to get usable 'lather', just by speading it over my slightly warmed skin.The other day, after a week of no shaves, I used it again, not expecting great results. It spread well over my beard, created a nice lather, and the razor had no problems shaving my long whiskers off. Even with an old blade, the shave went very smoothly.I'll stay with this shaving cream - I'm not sure about the effects of caffeine on the quality of the shave, but the mint smell isn't overly strong and washes off, and the overall shaving experience with this shaving cream is good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars THIS IS THE BEST SHAVING CREAM
reviews.reviewText: That's what the product says, and it's right. It also says a little goes a long way - I had a single tube last me FOUR YEARS and the smell, ingredients, and results are fantastic. Easy 5 stars!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great! There's a trick to it ...
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this to try it because I do everything I can to not voluntarily invite any toxins in or on my body: that means food, drink and any 'health care' / pharma or grooming products.I gave it a couple weeks and 5-6 shaves before coming to conclusions. First few shaves I felt it was a bit hard to get an even spread over my chin and neck, and my blades were gumming up. Then I got the hang of it:- Squeeze a small amount on one hand's fingers- Rub the fingers of both hands together to spread evenly on both hands fingers- Run some hot water, then pat the lotion your face ... dip fingers in hot water .. work it into a lather on your fingers and your face- When you shave, run the blades under the hot water a bit more than you would with commercial creamsBy using a small amount .. working up a lather using a bit of hot water ... and rinsing the blade a bit more often it works amazing. Smooth shave, pleasant scent and no toxic crap absorbing into your skin.AND you can make it last a long time following these tips. I'll order again 👍

O creme é líquido demais e vaza facilmente ao se deixar o recipiente virado para baixo. Dito isso, é um bom creme e tem uma ótima formulação.Aprendi que é melhor, mais rápido e mais fácil utilizar as próprias mãos para esfregar e passar o creme no rosto. Basta colocar um pouco nas mãos, esfregá-las até adquirir consistência, e passar no rosto.
a bit pricey, but the quality is so good. made my legs super smooth too!

Love the smell and especially the fact that it’s rated a 3 in the Think Dirty App! It also lathers quite well and stays that way so you can see where you’ve shaved! FYI I’m female and use it for my legs and underarms.

reviews.reviewTitle: Excelente producto! Ya no se encuentra en México :(
reviews.reviewText: El mejor producto que he usado para afeitarme y ya no lo venden en México, es una lástima. Desconozco porque lo han dejado de vender ya que también desapareció de Farmacias del Ahorro en donde también lo vendían.

reviews.reviewTitle: Lasts really long and my husband loves it
reviews.reviewText: My husband loves this shaving cream and says it is the best he has ever used. Not only is it natural, but he says it lasts a really long time because you don't need to use much at all (a very small amount on your finger). He also says that it gives a really smooth shave - no irritation or issues with the razor at all. We couldn't find it again in the stores, so he was happy I found it here.
